posts.post_content:
"The guilds each believe its way is right, but their ways only bring blood to Ravnica's streets and tears to Ravnica's families."  
  
Like you have any room to talk, Caregiver, every petty act of care you provide costs some poor creature its life.  
  
In terms of Hippocratic Oath violations per workday, this must be the Worst. Caregiver. Ever. Pretty sure even [Goblin Chirurgeon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Chirurgeon) has a better track record. :P

Posted By: Salient (8/26/2011 10:49:38 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Come on guys... this card isn't worth its terrible 0.8 rating it has right now. Take a step back and realise that its {w for a 1/1 with a beneficial ability. That's right - it may be absolutely terrible, but it won't hurt you for having it, unlike [certain other 1/1s](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=46078). There are definately situations where it can save you the game, like if you're about to eat a lightning bolt to the face and you're on 3 life. Granted, something like [Ghost-Lit Redeemer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ghost-Lit Redeemer) or [Burrenton Forge-Tender](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Burrenton Forge-Tender) will do this much more efficiently, but even Caregiver could save you in that situation, so give it some credit - it's not a 0.5 card, as many people have obviously voted it.
posts.html:
Come on guys... this card isn't worth its terrible 0.8 rating it has right now. Take a step back and realise that its {w for a 1/1 with a beneficial ability. That's right - it may be absolutely terrible, but it won't hurt you for having it, unlike certain other 1/1s. There are definately situations where it can save you the game, like if you're about to eat a lightning bolt to the face and you're on 3 life. Granted, something like Ghost-Lit Redeemer or Burrenton Forge-Tender will do this much more efficiently, but even Caregiver could save you in that situation, so give it some credit - it's not a 0.5 card, as many people have obviously voted it.
